as.description: Custom element type for the component

checked.description: Specifies whether the checkbox is selected

color.description: The color of the checkbox when checked or indeterminate

defaultChecked.description: Specifies the initial state: whether or not the checkbox is selected

indeterminate.description: When being a checkbox , setting styles after the child part is selected

name.description: Used for the name of the form

onChange.type: (value: string | number, checked: boolean, event) => void
onChange.description: Callback fired when checkbox is triggered and state changes

value.description: Correspond to the value of CheckboxGroup, determine whether to select

name.description: Used for the name of the form

onChange.description: Callback fired when checkbox is triggered and state changes
